ABOUT US - DRIVING TRAINING INSTITUTE

As a renowned driving training institute, Emirates Transport Driving Institute trains, assessors & qualifies drivers, with high specification standards to provide safe transport convenience, high efficiency and premium quality which all contribute to enhance the service attractiveness of the UAE as a front in a civilized and tourism attractive country.
